message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.SY 

The paper deals with the problem of prediction with expert advice, which is a topic in machine learning and decision making. The use of the multiplicative weights method and the analysis of regret suggest that the paper could belong to the Information Theory (cs.IT) or Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The focus on algorithms and optimization also suggests the Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-category. Additionally, the use of stochastic calculus and the consideration of a continuous analogue suggest the paper could belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) or Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories.
